application.doc: Creating a new user in the registry

method.name: POST
method.doc: To complete this operation with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP POST command on the users resource URI.

request.doc:
Creating a user with group memberships: POST https://{appliance_hostname}/mga/user_registry/users/v1 POST_DATA: { "id":"OAuthPEUser", "password": "Passw0rd", "groups": [ "OAuthPEGroup" ] }
Creating a user without any group membership: POST https://{appliance_hostname}/mga/user_registry/users/v1 POST_DATA: { "id":"OAuthPEUser", "password": "Passw0rd" }

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: id
param.doc: The name of the new user. Names may only consist of alpha-numeric characters and the following symbols: '-' '_' '.'.

param.name: password
param.doc: The password for the new user. This can contain any ASCII characters.

param.name: groups
param.doc: A list of groups the new user will belong to.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.

param.name: id
param.doc: The name of the new user.
